title: What happens to my BMS Cash if I donâ€™t use BookMyShow App for over 1 year? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Your BMS Cash account stays active, however, please note that every credit transaction into BMS Cash comes with an expiry time,
at which a part or full amount from your
BMS Cash
will expire.
The user shall be sent a reminder about the expiry of the
one month in advance, by an email to the registered email id.
